name: Java 21 + Gradle
postCreateCommand: /bin/bash -lc 'curl -L https://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-8.10.2-bin.zip -o /tmp/gradle.zip && sudo mkdir -p /opt/gradle && sudo unzip -q /tmp/gradle.zip -d /opt/gradle && sudo ln -sf /opt/gradle/gradle-8.10.2/bin/gradle /usr/local/bin/gradle && gradle wrapper --gradle-version 8.10.2 || true'
